name: Stop That Clock
description:
Hi, thank you for trying out my first ever game that did not follow a guide. I know it is not good or not even normal. I am happy with the concept and main features. 

 There are a lot of problems and missing features that i wanted to add but i could not. For those you can check Known Problems and Missing Features

Known Problem

  • Flickering on platforms
  • If you are crushed by a platform you can not continue and you need to restart the game

Missing Features

  • Music and sound effect for others
  • After taking the pickup a circle that get smaller in time which make harder to see. 
  • Animation
  • Background and scene transition
